document_data.name: Drawmij's Marvelous Shield
document_data.mainbody: '''''Drawmij's marvelous shield''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[evocation]] [[spell]] that improved upon the ''[[Shield (spell)|shield]]'' spell.
document_data.Effects: When summoned, a ''marvelous shield'' offered protection for the caster on all sides and from above so long as the caster saw the attack coming. Any sneak attack upon the caster would bypass the protection of the shield.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was developed by the [[Oerth]]an [[wizard]] [[Drawmij]] but was used on [[Toril]].
